summary: Felldew, the drug of choice in Oblivion's Shivering Isles, is now available in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/gallery/image/2059-title/][IMG]http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/uploads/gallery/album_4/gallery_1482_4_99593.png[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[color=#FE6CEA][center]This mod was made for fun and giggles. Take a break from killing to enjoy a little amusement on the side![/center][/color]
[line]
From the depths of the Oblivion plane of Sheogorath, the Shivering Isles; smuggled into Skyrim by those crafty Khajiits. Felldew, the once highly addictive drug arrives in a new refined potion form. No longer addictive yet still euphoric and mesmerizing. You'll always want more.

Felldew provides a unique visual effect, increases your speed by 25% for 2 minutes, but decreases your health by 50 for 2 minutes.

Available for sale through the Khajiit caravans or the random drug dealing adventurers. Enjoy!

[u]Install/Uninstall[/u]

Unpack the archive into the Data folder or install with any mod manager. Activate the .esp.
To uninstall, de-activate the .esp and delete along with the .bsa.

This mod is already cleaned with TES5Edit.
author: Hanaisse
